headline: Auto parts suppliers' market moves post–tariff announcement
summary: Auto parts suppliers, such as Magna International (MGA), Dana Incorporated (DAN), and Genuine Parts (GPC), face uncertainty following President Trump's announcement of new tariffs on cars and car parts, set to take effect next week and May 3rd, respectively. Morning Brief hosts Brad Smith and Madison Mills discuss the details. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.

Morning Brief hosts Brad Smith and Madison Mills discuss the details.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.
